author: daniel.friedman
title: GameFi/Metaverse Developer Treasury
description: How do we provide a decentralized funding pathway specialized for GameFi & metaverse projects which want to build on Cardano & use CNFTs?
importance: GameFi & metaverse building is taking the industry by storm. We need to have a funding vehicle to attract projects to build on Cardano.
success: A decentralized treasury will give projects incentives to build GameFi on Cardano and allow the community to decide what interests them.
